title: Wham!
summary: Wham! (briefly known in the US as Wham! U.K.) were  an English pop duo formed in Bushey in 1981.[1][2] The duo consisted of George Michael and Andrew Ridgeley. They became one of the most commercially successful pop acts of the 1980s, selling more than 30 million certified records worldwide from 1982 to 1986.[3]
